SELECT REVIEWID, USERID, REVIEWTITLE, REVIEWCONTENT, UPLOADIMG, REGDATE, TRAINERID, TRAINER FROM PSTM_REVIEWINFO

SELECT REVIEWID, USERID, REVIEWTITLE, REVIEWCONTENT, UPLOADIMG, REGDATE, TRAINERID, TRAINER FROM (SELECT SEQ, REVIEWID, USERID, REVIEWTITLE, REVIEWCONTENT, UPLOADIMG, REGDATE, TRAINERID, TRAINER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, REVIEWID, USERID, REVIEWTITLE, REVIEWCONTENT, UPLOADIMG, REGDATE, TRAINERID, TRAINER FROM (SELECT * FROM PSTM_REVIEWINFO) ) WHERE SEQ > #{offset}) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{count}
